mapper.select: select CT_NO as ctNo,StuNO as stuNo,StuName as stuName,BookNO as bookNo,BookName as bookName,DelayTime as delayTime from continuetimes where StuName like #{username} limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select CT_NO as ctNo,StuNO as stuNo,StuName as stuName,BookNO as bookNo,BookName as bookName,DelayTime as delayTime from continuetimes where StuName = #{username} limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
